resources.string:
Simple timed math game. 
 
Once the game starts, for every correct answer the player will get one point. 
For ever incorrect answer the player loses a point. If the player selects three correct answers in a row, they will get three extra seconds added to their time.
 
Good luck!!

Please select a difficulty on the right.

FALLING BLOCKS!
 
Select two blocks that will create the total in the purple box. Your time and score will carry over from level 1, so the more you bring with you, the move you have!
 
 Good luck :)
